answerText: Chinua Achebe[10] The Minister of Information, Chris Oriko, and the political journalist, Ikem Osodi, detail the rule of Sam, the dictator of Kangan in this novel by Chinua Achebe.
heading: MAGNI |2011 | 1 | 17 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Chief Ezeulu refuses to act on behalf of District Comissioner Winterbottom in his novel Arrow of God. For 10 points each: [10] Name this Nigerian novelist who wrote about the transformation of Umuofia by Christian missionaries in Things Fall Apart.
